  • Martin Faunes

import { MediaMatcher } from '@angular/cdk/layout'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidena', templateUrl: './sidena.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidena.component.css'] }) export class SidenaComponent implements OnInit { mobileQuery: MediaQueryList; menuNav = [ {name:"Home", route:"home", icon: "home"}, {name:"Twin Files", route:"category", icon: "inventory"}, {name:"Twin Executions", route:"comparacion", icon: "upload_file"}, {name:"Create new Twins", route:"comparacion", icon: "file_open"}, {name:"New Twin Execution", route:"comparacion", icon: "note_add"}, {name:"Report Twin File", route:"comparacion", icon: "report"} ] constructor(media: MediaMatcher) { this.mobileQuery = media.matchMedia('(max-width: 600px)'); } shouldRun = true; ngOnInit(): void { // TODO document why this method 'ngOnInit' is empty } }
